## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`nfsclient`](#nfsclient): Manage nfs client and secure communication (krb)

## Classes

### <a name="nfsclient"></a>`nfsclient`

nfsclient class

#### Examples

##### Declaring the class

```puppet
include nfsclient
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `nfsclient` class:

* [`gss`](#gss)
* [`keytab`](#keytab)

##### <a name="gss"></a>`gss`

Data type: `Boolean`

Configure GSS. Class does nothing without this being set to true.

Default value: ``false``

##### <a name="keytab"></a>`keytab`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::Unixpath]`

Location of keytab file in configuration files.

Default value: ``undef``
